name: Agile-Estimator
tag_list: agile, software-estimation, estimation-tools, estimating, scrum, sprint-planning, project-management, rfp
overview:
What? A-E a collaborative software project estimating platform. It allows users to pull together project estimates quickly and efficiently. It also improves profitability and helps identify risks.

Why?

Building technology is expensive and complex most technology projects fail to hit projected timelines and/or budgets Change is constant and prevalent Estimating should be frequent Risks can be difficult to quantify Estimating is a team exercise Organizations lack estimating standards

How?

5+ years of modeling Field tested Validated against other estimating tools Uses proprietary technologies and techniques Development centric Engages the people actually doing the work

milestones.description: AE is pleased to announce that we launched our new customer facing website. We also released AE 2.0 to our cloud platform. Both of these milestones represent our commitment to making making the world of software development a better place.
